duties_responsibilities.duty: Transforming client maturity and improving control environments.
Creating new client offerings and defining and leading engagements.
Influencing, shaping, and growing the Security Advisory practice.
Driving multi-million sales and revenues, and building a strong consultancy project pipeline.
Understanding clients’ security needs, solving unique problems, and shaping commercial models, risk, and go-to-market strategies.

Guiding transformative projects, enhancing maturity, defining strategy, solving technology issues, optimizing business processes, providing assurance, strengthening controls, reducing security risk, and enabling new secure ways of working.
Driving industry-aligned focus and taking offerings to industry verticals via sales teams.
Growing and nurturing internal talent, passing on knowledge and experience to create the leaders of the future.
Hiring consulting specialists, ex-technologists, people from industry, pre-sales architects, academics, and more.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Cyber Security, Information Technology, Business, or a related field (Master’s preferred)
